00036     double PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionSmithWatermanAffin(
00037         const bpp::Sequence* A, const PseudoRotatedSequence* B,
00038         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta, ScoreMatrix3D* D,
00039         ScoreMatrix3D* P, ScoreMatrix3D* Q, uint &bi, uint &bj)
00040       {
00041 
00042         double gapOpenP;
00043         double gapExtendP;
00044         double gapOpenQ;
00045         double gapExtendQ;
00046         double diagScore;
00047 
00048         double lrla = 0;
00049 
00050         //B is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is B/2
00051         int slaps = B->size()/2;
00052         //catch (stupid User Exception)
00053         if (delta != 0)
00054           slaps /= delta;
00055 
00056         //Forward
00057         //#ifdef _OPENMP            
00058         //#pragma omp parallel for
00059         //#endif           
00060         for (uint i=1; i<A->size()+1; i++)
00061           {
00062             // haeeh?
00063             for (int k=1; k<slaps; k++)
00064               {
00065                 D->at(i).at(0).at(k) = 0;
00066                 P->at(i).at(0).at(k) = 0;
00067                 Q->at(i).at(0).at(k) = 0;
00068               }
00069 
00070             for (uint j=1; j<B->size()+1; j++)
00071               {
00072                 if (j % delta == 1)
00073                   {
00074 
00075                     //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00076                     diagScore = scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j
00077                         -1));
00078 
00079                     //Score of Open Gap in A
00080                     gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(0) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00081                         + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00082                     //Score of continue Gap in A
00083                     gapExtendP = P->at(i-1).at(j).at(0)+ scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00084 
00085                     //Set Helper Matrices Values
00086                     P->at(i).at(j).at(0) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenP, gapExtendP);
00087                     Q->at(i).at(j).at(0) = 0;
00088 
00089                     //Set Distance Matrix Value
00090                     D->at(i).at(j).at(0) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, P->at(i).at(j).at(0), 0);
00091 
00092                     //Save Best LRLA
00093                     if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(0) != lrla))
00094                       {
00095                         lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(0);
00096                         bi = i;
00097                         bj = j;
00098                       }
00099 
00100                     for (int k=1; k<slaps; k++)
00101                       {
00102                         //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00103                         diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(k-1) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00104                             B->getChar(j -1));
00105 
00106                         //Score of Open Gap in A
00107                         gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00108                             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00109                         //Score of continue Gap in A
00110                         gapExtendP = P->at(i-1).at(j).at(k)+ scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00111 
00112                         //Score of Open Gap in B
00113                         gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1).at(k-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i
00114                             -1)) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00115                         //Score of continue Gap in B
00116                         gapExtendQ = Q->at(i).at(j-1).at(k-1)
00117                             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i -1));
00118 
00119                         //Set Helper Matrices Values
00120                         P->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenP, gapExtendP);
00121                         Q->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenQ, gapExtendQ);
00122 
00123                         //Set Distance Matrix Value
00124                         D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, P->at(i).at(j).at(k), Q->at(i).at(j).at(k) );
00125 
00126                         //Check for 0
00127                         if (D->at(i).at(j).at(k) < 0)
00128                           D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = 0;
00129 
00130                         //Save Best LRLA
00131                         if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(k) != lrla))
00132                           {
00133                             lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00134                             bi = i;
00135                             bj = j;
00136 
00137                           }
00138                       }
00139                   }
00140                 else
00141                   for (int k=0; k<slaps; k++)
00142                     {
00143 
00144                       //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00145                       diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00146                           B->getChar(j -1));
00147 
00148                       //Score of Open Gap in A
00149                       gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00150                           + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00151                       //Score of continue Gap in A
00152                       gapExtendP = P->at(i-1).at(j).at(k)+ scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00153 
00154                       //Score of Open Gap in B
00155                       gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1))
00156                           + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00157                       //Score of continue Gap in B
00158                       gapExtendQ = Q->at(i).at(j-1).at(k)
00159                           + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00160 
00161                       //Set Helper Matrices Values
00162                       P->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenP, gapExtendP);
00163                       Q->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfTwo(gapOpenQ, gapExtendQ);
00164 
00165                       //Set Distance Matrix Value
00166                       D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, P->at(i).at(j).at(k), Q->at(i).at(j).at(k) );
00167 
00168                       //Check for 0
00169                       if (D->at(i).at(j).at(k) < 0)
00170                         D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = 0;
00171 
00172                       //Save Best LRLA
00173                       if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(k) != lrla))
00174                         {
00175                           lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00176                           bi = i;
00177                           bj = j;
00178 
00179                         }
00180 
00181                     }
00182 
00183               }
00184           }
00185 
00186         return lrla;
00187 
00188       }
00189     Alignment PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::BacktrackingSmithWatermanAffin(
00190         const bpp::Sequence* A, const PseudoRotatedSequence* B,
00191         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta, const ScoreMatrix3D* D,
00192         const ScoreMatrix3D* P, const ScoreMatrix3D* Q, uint &i, uint &j)
00193       {
00194 
00195         //Debug purpose
00196         stringstream cout;
00197 
00198         Alignment out(A->getAlphabet());
00199 
00200         vector<int> outA;
00201         vector<int>::iterator itA = outA.begin();
00202         vector<int> outB;
00203         vector<int>::iterator itB = outB.begin();
00204 
00205         double minScore = 0;
00206 
00207         //B is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is B/2
00208         int slaps = B->size()/2;
00209 
00210         if (delta != 0)
00211           slaps /= delta;
00212 
00213         while ( (i>0) && (j>0))
00214           {
00215 
00216             int gk = 0;
00217             double bestScore = 0;
00218 
00219             //Search maximum score within k
00220             for (int k=0; k<slaps; k++)
00221               {
00222                 //Search in D
00223                 if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j).at(k), bestScore) != bestScore)
00224                   {
00225                     bestScore = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00226                     gk = k;
00227                   }
00228 
00229                 //.. or Q
00230                 if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(Q->at(i).at(j).at(k), bestScore) != bestScore)
00231                   {
00232                     bestScore = Q->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00233                     gk = k;
00234                   }
00235                 //.. or P
00236                 if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(P->at(i).at(j).at(k), bestScore) != bestScore)
00237                   {
00238                     bestScore = P->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00239                     gk = k;
00240                   }
00241 
00242               }
00243 
00244             if (D->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == 0)
00245               break;
00246 
00247             //Change to Q
00248             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j).at(gk), Q->at(i).at(j).at(gk) ) == Q->at(i).at(j).at(gk))
00249               {
00250 
00251                 //Lonely Gap in A
00252                 if (Q->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == D->at(i).at(j-1).at(gk) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i -1))
00253                     + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1)))
00254                   {
00255                     minScore +=scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00256                     cout << "Left"<< endl;
00257                     cout << "Score + "
00258                         << scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1)) << std::endl;
00259                   }
00260                 //Continued Gap in A
00261                 else if (Q->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == Q->at(i).at(j-1).at(gk) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1)))
00262                   {
00263                     cout << "Left cont "<< endl;
00264                   }
00265                 else
00266                   {
00267                     cout << "Changed to Q but not possible?" << std::endl;
00268                   }
00269                 itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00270                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00271                 j--;
00272                 minScore +=scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00273                 cout << "Score + " << scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1))
00274                     << std::endl;
00275                 continue;
00276               }
00277 
00278             //Change to P
00279             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j).at(gk) , P->at(i).at(j).at(gk) ) == P->at(i).at(j).at(gk))
00280               {
00281                 //Lonely Gap in B
00282                 if (P->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == D->at(i-1).at(j).at(gk) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00283                     + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1)))
00284                   {
00285                     cout << "Up"<< endl;
00286                     minScore +=scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00287                     cout << "Score + "
00288                         << scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1)) << std::endl;
00289                   }
00290                 //Continued Gap in B
00291                 else if (P->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == P->at(i-1).at(j).at(gk) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j -1)))
00292                   {
00293                     cout << "Up cont"<< endl;
00294                   }
00295                 else
00296                   {
00297                     //                    cout << "Changed to P but not possible?" << std::endl;
00298                   }
00299                 minScore +=scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00300                 cout << "Score + " << scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1))
00301                     << std::endl;
00302                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00303                 itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00304                 i--;
00305                 continue;
00306 
00307               }
00308 
00309             //Diagonal
00310             else if (D->at(i).at(j).at(gk) == D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(gk) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1)))
00311               {
00312                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1));
00313                 cout << "Diag"<< endl;
00314                 cout << "Score + " << scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00315                     B->getChar(j-1)) << std::endl;
00316                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00317                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00318                 i--;
00319                 j--;
00320                 continue;
00321               }
00322 
00323             else
00324               {
00325 
00326                 cout << "42!!!"<< std::endl;
00327                 break;
00328               }
00329 
00330           }
00331 
00332         bpp::Sequence* seqA = new bpp::Sequence(A->getName(), outA, A->getAlphabet());
00333         bpp::Sequence* seqB = new bpp::Sequence(B->getName(), outB, B->getAlphabet());
00334 
00335         //Save Score to Container
00336         out.set_Score(minScore);
00337 
00338         //Add Alinged Sequences to Container
00339         out.addSequence(seqA);
00340         out.addSequence(seqB);
00341 
00342         delete seqA;
00343         delete seqB;
00344 
00345         return out;
00346 
00347       }
00348     double PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionSmithWaterman(
00349         const bpp::Sequence* A, const PseudoRotatedSequence* B,
00350         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta, ScoreMatrix3D* D,
00351         uint &bi, uint &bj)
00352       {
00353         double gapOpenP;
00354         double gapOpenQ;
00355         double diagScore;
00356 
00357         double lrla = 0;
00358 
00359         //B is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is B/2
00360         int slaps = B->size()/2;
00361 
00362         if (delta != 0)
00363           slaps /= delta;
00364 
00365         //Forward
00366         for (uint i=1; i<A->size()+1; i++)
00367           {
00368             // haeeh?
00369             for (int k=1; k<slaps; k++)
00370               {
00371                 D->at(i).at(0).at(k) = 0;
00372               }
00373             for (uint j=1; j<B->size()+1; j++)
00374               {
00375                 if (j % delta ==1)
00376                   {
00377                     //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00378                     diagScore = scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j
00379                         -1));
00380 
00381                     //Score of Open Gap in A
00382                     gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(0) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00383                         + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00384 
00385                     //Set Distance Matrix Value
00386                     D->at(i).at(j).at(0) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, gapOpenP, 0);
00387 
00388                     //Check for 0
00389                     if (D->at(i).at(j).at(0) < 0)
00390                       D->at(i).at(j).at(0) = 0;
00391 
00392                     //Save Best LRLA
00393                     if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(0) != lrla))
00394                       {
00395                         lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(0);
00396                         bi = i;
00397                         bj = j;
00398                       }
00399 
00400                     for (int k=1; k<slaps; k++)
00401                       {
00402                         //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00404                         diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(k-1) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00405                             B->getChar(j -1));
00406 
00407                         //Score of Open Gap in A
00408                         gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00409                             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00410 
00411                         //Score of Open Gap in B
00413                         gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1).at(k-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i
00414                             -1)) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00415 
00416                         //Set Distance Matrix Value
00417                         D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, gapOpenP,
00418                             gapOpenQ);
00419 
00420                         //Check for 0
00421                         if (D->at(i).at(j).at(k) < 0)
00422                           D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = 0;
00423 
00424                         //Save Best LRLA
00425                         if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(k) != lrla))
00426                           {
00427                             lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00428                             bi = i;
00429                             bj = j;
00430                           }
00431 
00432                       }
00433 
00434                   }
00435                 else
00436                   for (int k=0; k<slaps; k++)
00437                     {
00438                       //Score of Match eg. Mismatch
00439                       diagScore = D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00440                           B->getChar(j -1));
00441 
00442                       //Score of Open Gap in A
00443                       gapOpenP = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1))
00444                           + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(j-1));
00445 
00446                       //Score of Open Gap in B
00447                       gapOpenQ = D->at(i).at(j-1).at(k) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1))
00448                           + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00449 
00450                       //Set Distance Matrix Value
00451                       D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = scoreM->BestOfThree(diagScore, gapOpenP,
00452                           gapOpenQ);
00453 
00454                       //Check for 0
00455                       if (D->at(i).at(j).at(k) < 0)
00456                         D->at(i).at(j).at(k) = 0;
00457 
00458                       //Save Best LRLA
00459                       if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(lrla, D->at(i).at(j).at(k) != lrla))
00460                         {
00461                           lrla = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00462                           bi = i;
00463                           bj = j;
00464                         }
00465 
00466                     }
00467 
00468               }
00469           }
00470         return lrla;
00471       }
00472 
00473     Alignment PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::BacktrackingSmithWaterman(
00474         const bpp::Sequence* A, const PseudoRotatedSequence* B,
00475         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta, const ScoreMatrix3D* D,
00476         uint &i, uint &j)
00477       {
00478 
00479         vector<int> outA;
00480         vector<int>::iterator itA = outA.begin();
00481         vector<int> outB;
00482         vector<int>::iterator itB = outB.begin();
00483 
00484         Alignment out(A->getAlphabet());
00485 
00486         double minScore = double(0);
00487 
00488         //B is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is B/2
00489         int slaps = B->size()/2;
00490         if (delta != 0)
00491           slaps /= delta;
00492 
00493         double ScoreD;
00494         double ScoreDiag;
00495         double ScoreUpD;
00496         double ScoreLeftD;
00497 
00498         while ( (i>0) && (j>0))
00499           {
00500             int k = 0;
00501             bool shouldBreak = false;
00502 
00503             ScoreD = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00504 
00505             //Search maximum score within k
00506             for (k=0; k<slaps; k++)
00507               {
00508                 if (D->at(i).at(j).at(k) == 0)
00509                   {
00510                     shouldBreak = true;
00511                     break;
00512                   }
00513                 if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(D->at(i).at(j).at(k), ScoreD) != ScoreD)
00514                   ScoreD = D->at(i).at(j).at(k);
00515               }
00516             if (shouldBreak)
00517               break;
00518 
00519             ScoreDiag = D->at(i-1).at(j-1).at(k);
00520             ScoreLeftD = D->at(i).at(j-1).at(k);
00521             ScoreUpD = D->at(i-1).at(j).at(k);
00522 
00523             //Lonely Gap in A
00524             if (ScoreD == ScoreLeftD + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i -1)))
00525               {
00526                 //cout << "Left"<< endl;
00527                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00528                 itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00529                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00530                 j--;
00531               }
00532 
00533             //Lonely Gap in B
00534 
00535             else if (ScoreD == ScoreUpD
00536                 + scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1)))
00537               {
00538                 //cout << "Up"<< endl;
00539                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00540                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00541                 itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00542                 i--;
00543               }
00544             //Diagonal
00545 
00546             else if (ScoreD == ScoreDiag + scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1),
00547                 B->getChar(j-1)))
00548               {
00549                 minScore += scoreM->ScoreOf(A->getChar(i-1), B->getChar(j-1));
00550                 //cout << "Diag"<< endl;
00551                 itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00552                 itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00553                 i--;
00554                 j--;
00555               }
00556 
00557             else
00558               {
00559                 cout << "42!!! Lost in D"<< endl;
00560               }
00561 
00562           }
00563 
00564         while (i> 0)
00565           {
00566             //cout << "Overlapp A"<< endl;
00567             minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(i-1));
00568             itA = outA.insert(itA, A->getValue(i-1));
00569             itB = outB.insert(itB, -1);
00570             i--;
00571           }
00572 
00573         while (j> 0)
00574           {
00575             //cout << "Overlapp B"<< endl;
00576             minScore += scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(j-1));
00577             itB = outB.insert(itB, B->getValue(j-1));
00578             itA = outA.insert(itA, -1);
00579             j--;
00580           }
00581 
00582         bpp::Sequence* seqA = new bpp::Sequence(A->getName(), outA, A->getAlphabet());
00583         bpp::Sequence* seqB = new bpp::Sequence(B->getName(), outB, B->getAlphabet());
00584 
00585         //Save Score to Container
00586         out.set_Score(minScore);
00587 
00588         //Add Alinged Sequences to Container
00589         out.addSequence(seqA);
00590         out.addSequence(seqB);
00591 
00592         delete seqA;
00593         delete seqB;
00594 
00595         return out;
00596 
00597       }
00598 
00599     Alignment PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::NeedlemanWunschAlignment(
00600         const bpp::Sequence* inA, const bpp::Sequence* inB,
00601         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta)
00602       {
00603         PseudoRotatedSequence* B = new PseudoRotatedSequence(inB);
00604 
00605         ScoreMatrix D = matrix->InitializeScoreMatrixDistances(inA, B, scoreM);
00606 
00607         uint i = D.size()-1;
00608         uint j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00609 
00610         //Forward Iteration
00611         AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionSmithWaterman(inA, B, scoreM, &D, i,
00612             j);
00613 
00614         uint horizontalStart = i;
00615         Alignment temp = AlignmentFactory::BacktrackingSmithWaterman(inA, B,
00616             scoreM, &D, i, j);
00617         uint horizontalEnd = i;
00618 
00619         //Check for length of actual Alignment
00620         if ((horizontalStart-horizontalEnd) < inB->size())
00621           {
00622             //Seems to be ok
00623             return temp;
00624           }
00625         ScoreMatrix3D kD = matrix->InitScoreMatrix3DWith(inA, B, delta, 0);
00626 
00627         i = D.size()-1;
00628         j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00629 
00630         ForwardRecursionSmithWaterman(inA, B, scoreM, delta, &kD, i, j);
00631 
00632         return BacktrackingSmithWaterman(inA, B, scoreM, delta, &kD, i, j);
00633 
00634       }
00635 
00636     Alignment PseudoCircularAlignmentFactory::GotohAlignment(
00637         const bpp::Sequence* inA, const bpp::Sequence* inB,
00638         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &delta)
00639       {
00640         PseudoRotatedSequence B(inB);
00641 
00642         ScoreMatrix D = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, &B, 0);
00643         ScoreMatrix P = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, &B, 0);
00644         ScoreMatrix Q = matrix->InitScoreMatrixWith(inA, &B, 0);
00645 
00646         uint i = D.size()-1;
00647         uint j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00648 
00649         //Forward Iteration
00650         //        AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionGotoh(inA, &B, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q);
00651 
00652         AlignmentFactory::ForwardRecursionSmithWatermanAffin(inA, &B, scoreM,
00653             &D, &P, &Q, i, j);
00654 
00655         uint horizontalStart = j;
00656         Alignment temp = AlignmentFactory::BacktrackingSmithWatermanAffin(inA,
00657             &B, scoreM, &D, &P, &Q, i, j);
00658         uint horizontalEnd = j;
00659 
00660         //Check for length of actual Alignment
00661         if ((horizontalStart-horizontalEnd) <= inB->size())
00662           {
00663             //Seems to be ok
00664             std::cout << "Optimum sofort gefunden!" << std::endl;
00665             return temp;
00666           }
00667 
00668         //The hard way
00669         ScoreMatrix3D kD = matrix->InitScoreMatrix3DWith(inA, &B, delta, 0);
00670         ScoreMatrix3D kP = matrix->InitScoreMatrix3DWith(inA, &B, delta, 0);
00671         ScoreMatrix3D kQ = matrix->InitScoreMatrix3DWith(inA, &B, delta, 0);
00672 
00673         i = D.size()-1;
00674         j = D.at(0).size()-1;
00675 
00676         //Forward Iteration
00677         ForwardRecursionSmithWatermanAffin(inA, &B, scoreM, delta, &kD, &kP,
00678             &kQ, i, j);
00679 
00680         std::cout << "Start bei " << i << ":" << j << std::endl;
00681         return BacktrackingSmithWatermanAffin(inA, &B, scoreM, delta, &kD, &kP,
00682             &kQ, i, j);
00683 
00684       }
00685   }
